snippet: “My Father and the Man in Black,” about Johnny Cash, his onetime manager Saul Holiff and the black dog of depression, was made by Jonathan Holiff.
abstract: David DeWitt reviews Jonathan Holiff documentary film My Father and the Man in Black.
lead_paragraph: “My Father and the Man in Black,” about Johnny Cash, his onetime manager Saul Holiff and the black dog of depression, was made by Jonathan Holiff.
